Package ca.rededaniskal.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Add_Book_To_Library_Activity
    This activity lets a user input information about a book, and then adds it to their library in the database.
    Book_Details_Activity
    This activity lets the user view a book's details.
    Edit_Book_Instance_Activity
    This activity lets the user edit the information of a book that they own.
    Edit_Profile_Activity
    This activity lets a user update their personal information.
    Establish_Exchange_Details_Activity
    This activity lets the user set up the time, date and location for a book exchange.
    Forum_Activity
    This activity displays the forum of a specific book
    Login_Activity
    This lets the user enter their login information and log in, or lets them go to the register activity.
    Main_Activity
    This activity keeps track of all of the tabs which run on the "homepage" of our app.
    Set_Location_Activity
    This is a google maps activity that allows the user to drag and drop a marker to the their desired location.
    Signup_Activity
    This activity allows the user to input their information required to sign up to the app such as username, password, etc.
    Take_Photo_Activity
    This activity is allows the user to access their camera and take a picture.
    Upload_Img_Activity
    This activity uploads the image to firebase
    User_Details_Activity
    This activity displays all the details of a user, such as profile picture and username, and contains a button that allows the user to follow them
    View_All_Books_Activity
    This activity displays all the books that exist within the database of the app in a recyclerview
    View_All_Requests_Activity
    This activity displays all the requests related to the user in a recycler view
    View_All_Users_Activity
    This activity displays all the users that exist in the database and displays them in a recycler view.
    View_Book_Request_Activity
    This activity displays a book request made to the user which displays the book details, the individual requesting the book, and allows the user to accept or deny the request.
    View_Borrowed_Requested_Activity
    This activity allows the user to view all the books that they had borrowed or requested.
    View_Exchange_Details_Activity
    This activity displays the information regarding an exchange.
    View_My_Library_Activity
    This activity displays all the books the user owns using a recycler view.
    View_Pending_Exchanges_Activity
    This activity displays all exchanges that have not been completed.
    View_Rating_Post_Activity  
    View_Text_Post_Activity  
    View_Thread_Activity
    This activity displays all the threads/replies associated with a forum post
    View_Users_Activity
    This activity displays a list of users in a recycler view.
    View_Users_Library_Activity
    This activity allows the user to see all the books that they own in a recycler view.
